game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost city.
game.description: Deep within the heart of the jungle lies the lost city of Eldarath, hidden away for centuries. Legend has it that the city contains an ancient artifact, one that holds the key to unlocking great power.
game.reward: 100 gold pieces and a magical amulet

tasks.objective: Find the entrance to the lost city.
tasks.description: Locate the ancient temple that serves as the entrance to Eldarath. Be careful, for the jungle is full of dangers.
Once inside the lost city, navigate through its treacherous ruins to reach the artifact. Be prepared for traps and puzzles.
With the artifact in hand, make your way back through the jungle and find a safe haven to return to Gorvoth the Wanderer.
